mapper.select: select p.id, p.permission_name permissionName, p.parent_id parentId, p.item_type itemType, p.permission_code permissionCode, p.permission_url permissionUrl from permission p LEFT JOIN role_permission rp ON rp.permission_id=p.id LEFT JOIN role r ON r.id=rp.role_id and r.delete_state = '0' LEFT JOIN user_role ur ON ur.role_id=r.id WHERE ur.user_id=#{USER_ID} and p.item_type = #{ITEM_TYPE} and p.delete_state = '0' order by p.sort
